title: Loving 30 year marriage shows Bill Paxton was as rare a husband and father as he was an actor
text:

Hollywood and fans around the world have been paying tribute to the late Bill Paxton following his sudden death at the age of 61, on Sunday. 
And while he may have been the only movie star to face both a Terminator, Xenomorph (Aliens) and Predator (Predator II), the actor also enjoyed another Tinsel Town rarity - a loving marriage of 30 years. 
Bill, who starred in the likes of Aliens and Apollo 13, leaves behind his second wife, Louise Newbury, and their two children, James 23, and 19-year-old Lydia. Read More The late Bill Paxton leaves behind his wife of 30-years Louis Newbury (Photo: FilmMagic) 
The Texan-born star and Louise married in 1987, seven years after his divorce from actress, Kelly Rowan. 
The couple welcome their son James in 1994, and then in 1997 their daughter Lydia. 
Earlier this month, the actor revealed the romantic moment he met Louise whilst filming in London in 1983 on James Corden's The Late Late Show. Read More
